MsBackendWeizMass 0.1.0
  • Get started
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Mass Spectrometry Data Backend for WeizMass MS/MS Libraries

The MsBackendWeizMass package allows to access WeizMass MS/MS (v2) spectra library databases and hence adds support for these databases to the Spectra R package.

For more information see the package homepage.
